title: B2B Account Team
description: A mapping between the B2B Account owning team key and one or more user keys for users in B2B Sales User.

xdm:teamKey.description: Unique identifier composed of the sourceType, sourceInstanceId, and teamId.
xdm:teamKey.title: Team Key

xdm:userKey.description: Unique identifier composed of the sourceType, sourceInstanceId, and userId.
xdm:userKey.title: User Key

xdm:isDeleted.description: Identifies if this user has been deleted from the team. Intended for use with Salesforce.
xdm:isDeleted.title: IsDeleted
